name: Jellyfin
short_description: Free and open-source media server for streaming video, music, and photos.
description: Free and open-source media server for streaming video, music, and photos. Jellyfin is a self-hosted application focused on media, entertainment, streaming, video. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Jellyfin on your home server to free and open-source media server for streaming video, music, and photos without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Jellyfin to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
